title: An Introduction to Universals
description: Philosophy for Theologians opens up the subject of universals by discussing the basic approaches to reality found in thinkers such as Plato and Aristotle. After laying an introductory foundation, the panel discusses Bavinck’s approach to the subject and his views of how theology relates to disciplines. Participants: Bob LaRocca, Camden Bucey, Jared Oliphint, Paul Maxwell
content:encoded:
Philosophy for Theologians opens up the subject of universals by discussing the basic approaches to reality found in thinkers such as Plato and Aristotle. After laying an introductory foundation, the panel discusses Bavinck’s approach to the subject and his views of how theology relates to disciplines.

Participants: Bob LaRocca, Camden Bucey, Jared Oliphint, Paul Maxwell
